title: Electrochemical water splitting enhancement by introducing mesoporous NiCoFe-trimetallic phosphide nanosheets as catalysts for the oxygen evolution reaction
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17202-17212
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02344G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Gouda Helal, Zhenhang Xu, Wei Zuo, Yueying Yu, Jinyan Liu, Hongping Su, Jianxin Xu, Houbin Li, Gongzhen Cheng, Pingping Zhao
In this study, we explord the catalytic activity of NiCoFe_phosphide nanosheets as highly active and stable catalysts for OER. Electrochemical analysis exhibits a low overpotential of 259 mV in (1 M KOH), achieving a current density of 10 mA cm−2 with a low Tafel slope of 50.47 mV dec−1.
